description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter class for displaying recommended restaurants in the app's home UI. It manages binding restaurant data to item views, handling diffing for list updates, and user interactions.

classes.name: RecommendedRestaurantAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for rendering a list of recommended restaurants, utilizing diffing for efficiency.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for binding restaurant data to item view components.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a new ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds restaurant data at the given position to the ViewHolder, applying animations and setting view contents.
